name: Space Match (Bertan Çoban)
description:
Hello everyone,

I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed developing it. 

I would like to hear more about your comments on how to improve the game and make it more fun!

If you notice any bugs, you can always contact me on bertan.coban@ozu.edu.tr or you can post a comment below, the game is still in development!

Cheers!

Bertan Coban

Istanbul,TURKEY
